programme.title: NBA Countdown
programme.desc: Bold opinions, discussion and debate centered on the top storylines from around the league. Mike Greenberg hosts this pregame show with analysts Stepen A. Smith, Jalen Rose and Michael Wilbon.

programme.title: Timberwolves @ Warriors
programme.sub-title: Minnesota Timberwolves at Golden State Warriors
programme.desc: The Warriors and Timberwolves tangle in a clash of Western Conference playoff contenders. The clubs split the first two meetings this season, both in Minneapolis. Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards totaled 53 points and nine assists in those games.

programme.title: Clippers @ Nuggets
programme.sub-title: Los Angeles Clippers at Denver Nuggets
programme.desc: The Northwest Division-leading Nuggets aim to maintain their dominance of the Clippers. Denver seeks the regular-season sweep after besting LA by 53 points over three games earlier in the campaign. Jamal Murray (DEN) averaged 21 points in those wins.

programme.title: North Carolina @ Florida State
programme.desc: The Tar Heels sit on the NCAA Tournament bubble as they visit the Seminoles for an ACC affair. Florida State has lost six straight at home. North Carolina was No. 1 in the AP preseason Top 25 poll after reaching the 2022 national championship game.

programme.title: Baylor @ Oklahoma State
programme.desc: The Bears try to get right on the road as they ride with the Cowboys in a Big 12 game. Baylor has dropped two straight and three of its last four away from Waco, Texas. The Bears have won 13 of the last 16 meetings after a 74-58 triumph in January.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The Longhorns try to make it three straight over the Big 12 rival Bears. Texas owns its first win streak over Baylor since 2010 after a 68-55 decision in January behind DeYona Gaston's double-double. The Longhorns are 14-1 at the Moody Center.

programme.title: West Virginia @ Iowa State
programme.desc: The Cyclones play their final home game of 2022-23 when they host the Mountaineers in Big 12 play. West Virginia made it seven wins in its last eight against Iowa State on Feb. 8 as Kedrian Johnson's 22 points powered a 76-71 Mountaineers victory.

programme.desc: The Golden Eagles and Blue Demons prep for the Big East Tournament with this season finale. Marquette weathered a 24-point, 15-rebound performance from DePaul's Aneesah Morrow in a 72-63 win on Jan. 4. Jordan King paced Marquette with 23 points.

programme.title: Jackie Robinson: Get to the Bag
programme.desc: Spotlights the remarkable career of Jackie Robinson beyond baseball by blending the narrative of rapper Skyzoo and the voices of multiple generations to celebrate Robinson's extraordinary life and legacy, shedding new light on his journey.

programme.desc: A look at baseball career and legacy of the player known as "Big Papi," from the Red Sox's three World Series titles to his Hall of Fame induction; interviews with his teammates and rivals; showcasing his intimate moments and celebrations.
